Html:
Hello,
I am a Software Engineer from Egypt. I am a fresh graduate, yet I have had extensive experience in developing custom controls , as this is what I am doing now at my current job. I would like to be part of this promising project. I have already sent an e-mail to ascend_adm@hotmail.com.

hey welcome aboard I am also new around here though I am just a Beginner learning .net I am very much interested in developing custom Forms based Controls I am more of a web designer the new office 2007 Ribbon interface got me really interested :D

Thanks for your reply,
but how can I get an adminstrator to add me to the project. I already sent an e-mail and posted on the forum???

Fathalla,
I've responded to your email now. Just let me know when you are ready to get started.

Thanks,
Scott

Hi there,

I am also interested in joining. I love developing custom controls and I really like this library. I've sent an email to the ascend_adm@hotmail.com address. Hope to hear from you soon!
Hey scorn - anyone home? Is the project still under active development?
